= TPJSystemFolders =

*Project:* [SystemInformationUnit System Information Unit].

*Unit:* _PJSysInfo_.

This is a static class that provies details of the full paths of various special system folders. All _TPJSystemFolders_'  functionality is exposed via static methods. Because it is static the class does not need to be instantiated before use.

== Methods ==

|| *Method* || *Description* ||
|| _[TPJSystemFoldersCommonFiles CommonFiles]_ || Gets the Common Files folder path. ||
|| _[TPJSystemFoldersProgramFiles ProgramFiles]_ || Gets the Program Files folder path. ||
|| _[TPJSystemFoldersSystem System]_ || Gets the System folder path. ||
|| _[TPJSystemFoldersSystemWow64 SystemWow64]_ || Gets the System folder path used by WOW64. ||
|| _[TPJSystemFoldersTemp Temp]_ || Gets the temporary files folder path. ||
|| _[TPJSystemFoldersWindows Windows]_ || Gets the Windows folder path. ||

== Properties ==

_TPJSystemFolders_ defines no properties.

== Events ==

_TPJSystemFolders_ defines no events.
